game.name: Starward
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: The Steam version of 《Starward》 is an Asian server version, and the account is not compatible with other servers. Starward is a 3D fighting game that integrates mecha girls and classic GVG combat gameplay, with 1V1 and 2V2 mode as the core gameplay.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Steam version of 《Starward》 is an Asian server version, and the account is not compatible with other servers. Starward is a 3D fighting game that integrates mecha girls and classic GVG combat gameplay, with 1V1 and 2V2 mode as the core gameplay.
